Message:
A few days had passed
since I’d left the village.
But, I’d only managed
to gather enough food
for two people.

This’ll barely make a dent...!
I have to get more...
But, how...?

Maybe because I haven’t
eaten in two days,
I can barely think...

“If you’re that hungry,
why not just eat
what you’ve found?”

“You’ll be the one banished
if you go back like this, y’know.
Should you really be worrying
about others right now?”

As though someone were
whispering in my ear,
bad thoughts floated into
my head one after another.

My stomach let out
a loud grumble.
Its constant rumbling
gnawed away at both
my reason and soul.

I was suddenly overcome
with the fear that I would
become someone else,
so...I began to hum a tune.

It was the song I’d often sung
together with the other kids
in the village.
